lead_paragraph: When saving for retirement, investors in fixed investment vehicles should look for the “sweet spot” between short-term savings and long-term bonds.

headline.print_headline: The Goldilocks Strategy for Prudent Investors
headline.main: The Goldilocks Strategy for Prudent Investors

snippet: When saving for retirement, investors in fixed investment vehicles should look for the “sweet spot” between short-term savings and long-term bonds....
abstract: Retiring column; those saving for retirement who insist on having so-called rainy-day funds in bank accounts or money market funds are making mistake, as those accounts fail to keep up with rising cost of living; better options exist, particularly if investors keep in mind so-called Goldilocks strategy of placing that money in fixed investment vehicles that mature in medium term.
